title: Joey Cahill from Wanna Hear It Records
itunes:title: Joey Cahill from Wanna Hear It Records
description:
What is it like to run a record store? Has that been a question you have asked yourself? How about a small business? The answer to these questions and more I had my good bud and friend of the show Joey Cahill from Wanna Hear It Records on to discuss his first year of being in business, some important learnings and why classic rock SELLS. 

Donate to Global Giving to benefit the citizens of the Ukraine. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
